verses.name: Philemon 1:7
verses.text: For we have great joy and consolation in thy love, because the bowels of the saints are refreshed by thee, brother.

verses.name: Philemon 1:8
verses.text: Wherefore, though I might be much bold in Christ to enjoin thee that which is convenient,

verses.name: Philemon 1:9
verses.text: Yet for love’s sake I rather beseech thee, being such an one as Paul the aged, and now also a prisoner of Jesus Christ.

verses.name: Philemon 1:10
verses.text: I beseech thee for my son Onesimus, whom I have begotten in my bonds:

verses.name: Philemon 1:11
verses.text: Which in time past was to thee unprofitable, but now profitable to thee and to me:
